results.title: Video tech

results.title: Video sound
results.creator_credit: KTV Productions, John A. Givins and Lynn John
results.brief_description:
Episode number 4 of Series “Video tech”.
This episode looks at background noise and how to reduce it. It explains the uses of single, wide or omni-directional microphones, extension mikes and their placement (especially with interviews or music), directional mikes and how to use them together effectively.
results.creator_credit_for_label: KTV Productions, John A. Givins and Lynn John
results.description:
Episode number 4 of Series “Video tech”.
This episode looks at background noise and how to reduce it. It explains the uses of single, wide or omni-directional microphones, extension mikes and their placement (especially with interviews or music), directional mikes and how to use them together effectively.

results.title: Video self-portrait
results.brief_description: Video images are framed, filtered, coloured and super-imposed in the movie camera. Abstract spiralling forms produced by feedback, finally consume the filmmaker’s face.

results.title: Video maker
results.creator_credit: Alliance Productions, Nine Network (Australia), Scott Young and Shane Yeend
results.brief_description: Video maker is designed to help transform the confused home video operator into a budding video director. This tape looks at topics such as focus, handheld and zoom, camera editing, depth of field and exposure as well as looking at terminology, different filming techniques and equipment.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Alliance Productions, Nine Network (Australia), Scott Young and Shane Yeend
results.description: Video maker is designed to help transform the confused home video operator into a budding video director. results.title: Video expeditions collection
results.brief_description: This series of travel documentaries is sure to delight. They engage even the most dedicated armchair traveller on a series of adventures guaranteed to create itchy feet and a desire to pack and head for the nearest travel agent.

results.title: Video and Animation Workshops 2006
results.brief_description: A selection of video and animated works created by young students from different schools in various ACMI Workshops during 2006, including “Scratch it”, “Digital Poetry”, and “Claymation”. Also includes two untitled abstract animated works.
